1.description: We box up all our toys and books, and put them into a big truck.

2.description:
After loading the truck, it goes across the bridge, to our new house.

In this household, "over the bridge" means exactly one thing: going to Berkeley.

3.description:
The truck stops at our new house. We put all the boxes inside. Upstairs, Felix has his own room with a real bed that he can get in and out of.

Felix has mixed feelings about the concept of a new bed. He likes the sound of it, but he definitely gives a worried look towards his crib.

4.description: As part of clearing up the misunderstanding about Nana living in Berkeley, Felix insisted that we draw "Nana's" beach house, including Nana's SUV and the red convertible.

description: Felix commissioned Dean and Lucie to do these drawings of the upcoming move.
title: April 18
